entry.title: hexo-theme-next主题升级的时候配置文件冲突解决方法
entry.content: hexo-theme-next主题是hexo一个广为使用的主题。当采用git pull 升级的时候，会将master分支拉到本地中，然而 主题配置文件会和我们已经自定义过的配置冲突。官方提供了两个方法 next主题github地址https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next 当采用git pull 升级的时候，会将master分支拉到本地中，然而 主题配置文件会和我们已经自定义过的配置冲突。官方提供了两个方法： 1. git 操作命令来解决https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15745045/how-do-i-resolve-git-saying-commit-your-changes-or-stash-them-before-you-can-me/15745424#15745424 核心命令： 1234567891011121314151617Commit the change usinggit commit -m "My message"Stash it.Stashing acts as a stack, where you can push changes, and you pop them in reverse order.To stash, typegit stashDo the merge, and then pull the stash:git stash popDiscard the local changesusing git reset --hardor git checkout -t -f remote/branchOr: Discard local changes for a specific fileusing git checkout filename 2 用HEXO的DATA-FILES 来解决参见 https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next/blob/master/docs/DATA-FILES.md 推荐方法： 12345678910Please ensure you are using Hexo 3 (or above).Create an file named next.yml in site's hexo/source/_data directory (create _data directory if it did not exists).And after that steps there are 2 variants, need to choose only one of them and resume next steps.Variant 2: override: true:In next.yml set override option on true.Copy all NexT theme options from theme's next/_config.yml into hexo/source/_data/next.yml.Then, in main site's hexo/_config.yml need to define theme: next option (and if needed, source_dir: source).Use standart parameters to start server, generate or deploy (hexo clean && hexo g -d && hexo s).

entry.title: HEXO_next主题 自带样式设置
entry.content: 参考文档: http://theme-next.iissnan.com/tag-plugins.html 居中居中标签设置 1{% cq %} 居中标签设置 {% endcq %} note样式Content (md partial supported) 1{% note default %} Content (md partial supported) {% endnote %} default 1<div class="note default"><p>default</p></div> primary 1<div class="note primary"><p>primary</p></div> success 1<div class="note success"><p>success</p></div> info 1<div class="note info"><p>info</p></div> warning 1<div class="note warning"><p>warning</p></div> danger 1<div class="note danger"><p>danger</p></div> danger no-icon 1<div class="note danger no-icon"><p>danger no-icon</p></div> 主题配置文件1234567891011121314# Note tag (bs-callout).note: # Note tag style values: # - simple bs-callout old alert style. Default. # - modern bs-callout new (v2-v3) alert style. # - flat flat callout style with background, like on Mozilla or StackOverflow. # - disabled disable all CSS styles import of note tag. style: simple icons: true #改成true 就可以显示图标 border_radius: 3 # Offset lighter of background in % for modern and flat styles (modern: -12 | 12; flat: -18 | 6). # Offset also applied to label tag variables. This option can work with disabled note tag. light_bg_offset: 0 label 样式default {% label default@default %} primary {% label primary@primary %} success {% label success@success %} info {% label info@info %} warning {% label warning@warning %} danger {% label danger@danger %} tab选项卡 1选项卡 2选项卡 3这是选项卡 1 列表 列表 这是选项卡 2 内容balabala2这是选项卡 3 哇，你找到我了！φ(≧ω≦*)♪～ 1234567891011121314百分号前面的数字就是定位在第几个tab上{% tabs 选项卡, 1 %} <!-- tab -->**这是选项卡 1** * 列表* 列表<!-- endtab --><!-- tab -->**这是选项卡 2** 内容balabala2<!-- endtab --><!-- tab -->**这是选项卡 3** 哇，你找到我了！φ(≧ω≦*)♪～<!-- endtab -->{% endtabs %}

entry.title: CHAMC工作笔记
entry.content: 报表类 两类减值计提报表chamc_devalue_proviston_pkg 总分核对XXT_GL_SL_CHECK_RPT_PKG.main 现金流表项刷数程序CHAMC_CF_SETUP_PKG.CHAMC_MAIN_P 抽取程序chamc_cl_csl_refresh_new_pkg xxt_other_mode_pkg 或有负债余额统计表chamc_credit_addition_hdr_pkg 科目余额表新 -表内chamc_gl_acct_bal_detail_pkg_h APEX页面批量审核查询 200-110 批量审核查询》集合式报账单200-107 回款计划展期按钮 117-235 回款计划报账单200-207 减值变动200-232 或有负债600-302 预分录-会计引擎总入口chamc_batch_create_sl_pkg 撤回总入口xxt_npa_recall_pkg 预分录总入口包chamc_cux_ois_int_pkg 报账单生成事务股权建账Chamc_Cux_Equity_New_Pkg 生成撤回预分录总校验包chamc_check_batch_pkg 回款计划导入chamc_return_plan_import_pkg 投放计划导入chamc_project_putin_import_pkg.chamc_process_main_p 或有负债导入事务xxt_ob_credit_addition_pkg.pro_ob_credit_addition_entity chamc_ob_credit_add_int_pkg.chamc_insert_table_p 报表-表外业务事项chamc_obs_stat_rpt_pkg 客商导入程序chamc_baisc_cust_import_pkg 业务系统db_link联查资产编号123456789101112WITH asset AS (SELECT /*+ materialize */ "asset_number" asset_number FROM chamc_asset_reduce_int@mssql_datasyncdb_pub.chamc.com.cn WHERE "header_id" IN (SELECT "BILL_ID" FROM busi_bill_synstatus@mssql_datasyncdb_pub.chamc.com.cn WHERE "BUSI_ID" = 103957 AND "BILL_TYPE" = 'FIAS_DIPOSAL'))SELECT flv.* FROM apps.fnd_lookup_values_vl flv, asset WHERE flv.meaning = asset.asset_number; 查资产映射1234567SELECT flv.meaning 项目系统资产编号,flv.tag 财务资产编号 -- INTO l_ora_asset FROM apps.fnd_lookup_values_vl flv WHERE flv.lookup_type = 'CHAMC_FINASSET_NUM_MAP' AND flv.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND flv.meaning IN ('16141920000600000001', '16141920000700000001'); 查coa12345678910SELECT description CHAMC_COA_ACC, flex_value FROM apps.FND_FLEX_VALUES_VL WHERE FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = (SELECT FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID FROM apps.FND_FLEX_VALUE_SETS WHERE FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME = 'CHAMC_COA_ACC') AND ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN NVL(START_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE - 1) AND NVL(END_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE + 1) AND SUMMARY_FLAG = 'N' 减值变动导入事务chamc_validate_impair_pkg EBS 操作请求集CHAMC_GL_ACC_HIERARCHY 常用视图和表资产余额SELECT * FROM apps.chamc_cost_details_v dv WHERE dv.asset_id ; SELECT * FROM apps.chamc_cost_balance_v bv WHERE bv.asset_id; cux_ois_accounting_entries 摊余应计利息12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455SELECT * FROM cux.chamc_cashflow_accounts a, cux.chamc_cashflow_headers_his h WHERE a.cashflow_history_id = h.cashflow_history_id AND h.biz_id IN (SELECT v.ASSET_ID FROM apps.chamc_asset_v v WHERE v.ASSET_NUMBER = '06140037-2-表外'); SELECT a.* FROM cux.chamc_cashflow_accounts a, cux.chamc_cashflow_headers_his h WHERE a.cashflow_history_id = h.cashflow_history_id AND h.biz_id = --关联到总账 SELECT /* sum(l.entered_dr - l.entered_cr)*/ E.PERIOD_NAME, L.ENTERED_DR, L.ENTERED_CR, e.status, aa.account_type, aa.cashflow_account_id, round(aa.account_amount, 2) 利息事务金额, decode(aa.in_bs_flag, 'Y', '表内', '表外') 利息事务上表内外标识, --aa.*, DECODE(L.SEGMENT3, '1506020101', '应收款项类投资-应计利息', '6111050101', '投资收益-应收款项类投资-持有期间', '8015020101', '逾期转表外-应计收益', '9015020101', '逾期转表外备抵-应收收益') 科目 FROM cux.xxt_sl_events e, cux.xxt_sl_entry_lines l, cux.xxt_sl_entity_relatns r, (SELECT a.* FROM cux.chamc_cashflow_accounts a, cux.chamc_cashflow_headers_his h WHERE a.cashflow_history_id = h.cashflow_history_id AND h.biz_id IN (SELECT v.ASSET_ID FROM apps.chamc_asset_v v WHERE v.ASSET_NUMBER = '22140079-1-表外')) aa WHERE e.event_id = l.event_id AND e.relation_id = r.relation_id AND r.relation_target = 'EVENT' AND r.entity_type = 'ACCRUED_INTEREST' AND r.entity_id = aa.cashflow_account_id AND ((aa.in_bs_flag = 'Y' AND l.segment3 IN ('8015020101', '9015020101')) OR (aa.in_bs_flag = 'N' AND l.segment3 IN ('1506020101', '6111050101')))-- AND e.period_name ORDER BY e.event_id; 资产证券化1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526SELECT cp.project_number 项目编号, cp.project_name, t.asset_pool_name 资产池名称, cat.abs_asset_number 资产池编号, ai.* FROM cux.chamc_restru_new_obligations o, cux.chamc_abs_asset_int ai, cux.chamc_abs_asset_trans cat, cux.chamc_abs_asset_pool_trans t, cux.chamc_projects cp WHERE o.sheet_business_type IS NOT NULL AND cat.source_code = 'CHAMC_ABS_ASSET_INT' AND cat.source_id = ai.header_id AND o.obligatory_number = ai.abs_asset_number AND cat.asset_pool_trans_id = t.transfer_id AND o.project_id = cp.project_id AND t.asset_pool_name LIKE '%浦发%' AND cp.project_number IN ('04130088', '04130094', '05140028', '05140042', '06130009', '20140093', '05120061'); 附件程序CHAMC_ATTACHMENT_PKG.CHAMC_PUBLIC_SAVE_P 摊余成本 && 应收利息摊余成本批量创建预分录XXT_CASHFLOW_PRE_ACCOUNT XXT_CASHFLOW_BATCH_IMP_PKG.sl_acct_batch 摊余成本批量传总账XXT_CASHFLOW_IMPORT_GL XXT_CASHFLOW_BATCH_IMP_PKG.import_gl_batch 二者合包chamc_ifrs9_run_pkg 营改增查是否应该计税12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728SELECT h.plan_return_header_id, l.line_num 行号, l.return_amount 回息金额, /* l.vat_overdue_flag 欠息标识,*/ l.return_date 回款日期 FROM cux.chamc_return_plan_headers h, cux.chamc_return_plan_lines l WHERE h.plan_return_header_id = l.plan_return_header_id /*AND h.biz_id = 1017953*/ AND h.project_id = 1000973 AND l.return_type = 'INTEREST';SELECT /* NVL(SUM(nvl(CDR.INTEREST_AMOUNT, 0)), 0)*/ crh.asset_number 资产编号, crh.gl_date 回收通知单总账日期, cdr.interest_amount 债务人还息金额, crh.total_amount 还款总额/* INTO v_rec_interest_amt_total*/ FROM cux.CHAMC_RECYCLE_HEADER_INT CRH, cux.CHAMC_DBT_RETURN_DETAIL_INT CDR WHERE CRH.HEADER_ID = CDR.HEADER_ID AND CRH.RECYCLE_TYPE = 'RET001' -- AND CRH.ORG_ID = 96 AND CRH.ASSET_NUMBER = '22140020-1' AND CRH.APPROVE_STATUS = 'SECOND_APPROVED' AND TO_CHAR(CRH.GL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') <= '2018-03'/*AND CRH.GL_DATE >= gc_calc_date*/; 标准模块获取客商地点id12345678SELECT hcsu.site_use_id FROM apps.hz_cust_site_uses_all hcsu, apps.hz_cust_acct_sites_all hcas, apps.hz_cust_accounts hca WHERE hcsu.cust_acct_site_id = hcas.cust_acct_site_id AND hcas.cust_account_id = hca.cust_account_id AND hca.account_number = p_cust_number AND hcsu.org_id = p_org_id; 请求在哪个职责下12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637SELECT z1 "职责", z2 "请求组", z3 "请求" FROM (SELECT res.RESPONSIBILITY_NAME z1, RG.REQUEST_GROUP_NAME z2, RV.USER_CONCURRENT_PROGRAM_NAME z3 FROM FND_RESPONSIBILITY_VL res, FND_REQUEST_GROUP_UNITS rgu, FND_CONCURRENT_PROGRAMS_VL RV, FND_REQUEST_GROUPS RG WHERE rgu.request_unit_type = 'P' AND res.CREATION_DATE > to_date('2011-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RES.APPLICATION_ID = RGU.APPLICATION_ID AND RES.REQUEST_GROUP_ID = RGU.REQUEST_GROUP_ID AND RV.APPLICATION_ID = RGU.UNIT_APPLICATION_ID AND RV.CONCURRENT_PROGRAM_ID = rgu.request_unit_id AND RG.Application_Id = RES.APPLICATION_ID AND RG.REQUEST_GROUP_ID = RGU.REQUEST_GROUP_ID UNION ALL SELECT res.RESPONSIBILITY_NAME z1, RG.REQUEST_GROUP_NAME, RV.USER_CONCURRENT_PROGRAM_NAME FROM FND_RESPONSIBILITY_VL res, FND_REQUEST_GROUP_UNITS rgu, FND_CONCURRENT_PROGRAMS_VL RV, FND_REQUEST_GROUPS RG WHERE rgu.request_unit_type = 'A' AND res.CREATION_DATE > to_date('2011-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RES.APPLICATION_ID = RGU.APPLICATION_ID AND RES.REQUEST_GROUP_ID = RGU.REQUEST_GROUP_ID AND RV.APPLICATION_ID = RGU.UNIT_APPLICATION_ID AND RG.Application_Id = RES.APPLICATION_ID AND RG.REQUEST_GROUP_ID = RGU.REQUEST_GROUP_ID ) WHERE z3 LIKE '%CHAMC_台账刷数据请求%' ORDER BY z1; 大数据迁移 表》表12345678#源端sql>create directory dump_oratst as '/app/PROD/oraprod/dump_data';expdp apps/apps TABLES=TMP_TSR_INTEREST dumpfile=TMP_TSR_INTEREST.dmp DIRECTORY=dump_oratst;#目标端sql>create directory dump_oratst as '/app/PROD/oraprod/dump_data';impdp apps/apps DIRECTORY=dump_oratst DUMPFILE=TMP_TSR_INTEREST.dmp ; 台总对账 zongzhang as (select v.branch_code, v.branch_name, v.account_code, v.account_name, v.item_code, v.item_name, v.biz_code, v.biz_name, sum(v.DR_BAL_SUM_ORIGINAL - V.CR_BAL_SUM_ORIGINAL) amount from ods.Chamc_Acct_Balances_v v where v.period_name = '2016-12' and v.DR_BAL_SUM_ORIGINAL <> V.CR_BAL_SUM_ORIGINAL and v.account_code in ('1101010101', '1101020101', '1111010101', '1111020101', '1111999999', '1132020101', '1132030101', '1132040101', '1132050101', '1132080101', '1132999999', '1302010101', '1441040101', '1441060101', '1442040101', '1442060101', '1501010101', '1501020101', '1501030101', '1502010101', '1503010101', '1503010102', '1503030101', '1503040101', '1504010101', '1506010101', '1506020101', '1507010101', '1511010101', '1511020101', '1511020201', '1511020301', '1511020401', '1512010101', '1512020101') group by v.branch_code, v.branch_name, v.account_code, v.account_name, v.item_code, v.item_name, v.biz_code, v.biz_name order by v.item_code, v.branch_code),yufenlu as (select cac.org_id, CAC.ORG_NAME, cac.account_code, CAC.ACCOUNT_NAME, cac.prject_code, CAC.PRJECT_NAME, cac.business_type_code, CAC.BUSINESS_TYPE_NAME, sum(cac.dr_amount - cac.cr_amount) amount from ods.chamc_asset_coa_detail_v cac where TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cac.accounting_date), 'YYYYMMDD') <= '20161231' and cac.dr_amount <> cac.cr_amount and cac.account_code in ('1101010101', '1101020101', '1111010101', '1111020101', '1111999999', '1132020101', '1132030101', '1132040101', '1132050101', '1132080101', '1132999999', '1302010101', '1441040101', '1441060101', '1442040101', '1442060101', '1501010101', '1501020101', '1501030101', '1502010101', '1503010101', '1503010102', '1503030101', '1503040101', '1504010101', '1506010101', '1506020101', '1507010101', '1511010101', '1511020101', '1511020201', '1511020301', '1511020401', '1512010101', '1512020101') group by cac.org_id, CAC.ORG_NAME, cac.account_code, CAC.ACCOUNT_NAME, cac.prject_code, CAC.PRJECT_NAME, cac.business_type_code, CAC.BUSINESS_TYPE_NAME order by cac.prject_code, cac.org_id)--总账预分录勾稽不平的select zongzhang.*, yufenlu.amount as yufenlu_amount from zongzhang, yufenlu where zongzhang.branch_code = yufenlu.org_id and zongzhang.account_code = yufenlu.account_code and zongzhang.item_code = yufenlu.prject_code and zongzhang.biz_code = yufenlu.business_type_code and zongzhang.amount <> yufenlu.amount AND zongzhang.amount <> 0UNION ALLselect zongzhang.*, yufenlu.amount from zongzhang LEFT JOIN yufenlu ON zongzhang.branch_code = yufenlu.org_id and zongzhang.account_code = yufenlu.account_code and zongzhang.item_code = yufenlu.prject_code and zongzhang.biz_code = yufenlu.business_type_code WHERE yufenlu.account_code IS NULL AND zongzhang.amount <> 0UNION ALLselect yufenlu.org_id, yufenlu.ORG_NAME, yufenlu.account_code, yufenlu.account_NAME, yufenlu.prject_code, yufenlu.prject_NAME, yufenlu.business_type_code, yufenlu.business_type_NAME, zongzhang.amount, yufenlu.amount from yufenlu LEFT JOIN zongzhang ON zongzhang.branch_code = yufenlu.org_id and zongzhang.account_code = yufenlu.account_code and zongzhang.item_code = yufenlu.prject_code and zongzhang.biz_code = yufenlu.business_type_code WHERE zongzhang.account_code IS NULL AND yufenlu.amount <> 0;

entry.title: NPM包管理命令
entry.content: 123456789101112npm安装模块【npm install xxx】利用 npm 安装xxx模块到当前命令行所在目录；【npm install -g xxx】利用npm安装全局模块xxx；本地安装时将模块写入package.json中：【npm install xxx】安装但不写入package.json；【npm install xxx –save】 安装并写入package.json的”dependencies”中；【npm install xxx –save-dev】安装并写入package.json的”devDependencies”中。npm 删除模块【npm uninstall xxx】删除xxx模块； 【npm uninstall -g xxx】删除全局模块xxx；

entry.title: HEXO_next 主题个性配置
entry.content: 文章字数统计及耗时功能参加网址 https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-symbols-count-time 12345678# Post wordcount display settings# Dependencies: https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-symbols-count-timesymbols_count_time: separated_meta: false #设置成true后 会换行显示 item_text_post: true item_text_total: false awl: 4 wpm: 275

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
